accessToken.title: Access Token
accessToken.description: Your REV Plus WebSocket API Access Token. Create one in the REV Plus Cloud Portal under 'Access Tokens' with 'WS Alarm API' permission.

alarmDuration.title: Alarm Duration (seconds)
alarmDuration.description: How long the alarm contact sensor should stay active after receiving an alarm (in seconds). Default: 300 (5 minutes)

items.helpvalue:
To use this plugin, you need a Personal Access Token from REV Plus Cloud:

  1. Log in to REV Plus Cloud Portal
  2. Go to 'Access Tokens'
  3. Create new PAT with WS Alarm API permission
  4. Copy the token and paste it below
